      • Game

        public Game(int rounds,
    Entity enemy)
        Constructs the game and creates both the enemy and player entities Constructs the Game with the amount of rounds and the type of Entity
        Parameters:
        rounds - indicates how many rounds are to be played
        enemy - indicates the type of Entity

    • Method Detail

      • playRound

        public void playRound(int choice)
        Plays one round of the game, updates any information regarding game logic. Starts off the Game logic depending on what the player's choice is.
        Parameters:
        choice - indicates the choice of the user, 1 = rock, 2 = paper, 3 = scissors

      • getFinishResult

        public int getFinishResult()
        Gets the result after the entire game is finished
        Returns:
        the result, 1 = user wins, 2 = draw, 3 = user loses

      • playerWin

        private boolean playerWin()
        Finds out if the user won that round depending on the choice of both entities
        Returns:
        true if player won that round, false if not

      • playerDraw

        private boolean playerDraw()
        Finds out if the user drew that round
        Returns:
        true if they drew, false if not

      • getResultId

        public int getResultId()
        Gets a numbered value for the result of that round
        Returns:
        the result value, 3 = win, 2 = draw, 1 = lose
